mutants.code:
def find_smallest_subsegment(arr, n):
    left = dict()
    count = dict()
    mx = 1
    mn = 0
    startindex = 0
    for i in range(n):
        ele = arr[i]
        if ele not in count.keys():
            left[ele] = i
            count[ele] = 1
        else:
            count[ele] += 1
        if count[ele] > mx:
            mx = count[ele]
            mn = i - left[ele] + 1
            startindex = left[ele]
        elif count[ele] == mx and i - left[ele] + 1 < mn:
            mn = i - left[ele] + 1
            startindex = left[ele]
    return arr[startindex:startindex + mn]
